item.title: Fly tipping - Ossory Rd, 22nd December
item.description:
Our street continues to be a place where fly tipping is continuing to happen. Grateful if you can please send a truck to pick up all of the rubbish that’s been dumped along Ossory Road. This current stack is down behind Asda

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ossory Road, Old Kent Road, Greater London

item.title: White goods dumped on pavement, 22nd December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 31, Beacon Road, Hither Green, Greater London

item.title: Graffitti - spray painted benches and signage., 22nd December
item.description:
Two memorial nbenches and a water safety sign have been damaged with yellow spray paint. Benches and sign located along side of Danson lake, Danson house side.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Danson Park, Welling, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 abandoned vehicles and a third untaxed vehicle, 22nd December
item.description:
Abandoned and nuisance vehicles: AK11LCK, KK11LCK are untaxed, unMOTed and have not moved in several months. They are inconsiderable left and over hanging a dropped curb. Outside NO 36 Burnham road. Y200S is an untaxed and unMOTed Renault Megane that is being driven on the road frequently. At times it is parked blocking public pavements
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18-24, Burnham Road, Albany Park, Sidcup, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street sweep needed urgently, 22nd December
item.description:
The street is a mess, has been for weeks, never gets a sweep yet you sweep the park and surrounding main streets regularily. This is a joke, you expect decent people to live here and build community and pay their taxes yet we can't rely on basic rubbish and street cleaning services. No deterrents to fly tipping, not even a sign. What will it take to see some action from the council, i promise you if you leave it like this, your tax base will move out and you'll all be out of a job, someone figure it out.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Ceres Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned car in woodlands road, 22nd December
item.description:
There is an abandoned car in woodlands road, its grey toyota, car reg is HW55 DHV. This has been there since friday night and the way its parked no one that works at William hill can park there. Please can this be removed asap.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Woodlands Road, Welling, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
